Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: Nahim, maim ki'amata de dina di sahu khanda ham
Ate nahim, maim nidi'a karana vali atamam di sahu khanda ham
Ki manukha samajhada hai ki asim usa di'am hadi'am nu ikatham nahim karange
Ki'um' nahim asim isa de samaratha ham ki usa di'am ungali'am de paute paute nu thika kara de'i'e
Sagom manukha cahuda hai ki uha usa de sahamane hatha kare
Uha puchada hai ki ki'amata da dina kadom avega
tam jadom akham cudhi'a janagi'am
Ate cada prakasahina ho javega
Ate suraja te cada ikathe kara dite janage
Usa dina manukha akhega ki (maim) kithe bhaja
Kade vi nahim, kite sarana nahim
Usa dina tere raba kola hi tikana hai
Usa dina manukha nu dasi'a javega ki usa ne age ki bheji'a ate piche ki chadi'a
Sagom manukha khuda apane apa nu cagi tar'ham janada hai
Bhavem uha kine hi bahane pesa kare
Tusim usa de parhana te apani zubana na cala'um (kahali nala) ki tusim usa nu jaladi sikha lavo
Sade upara (zimevari) hai usa nu ikatha karana ate usa nu suna'una
Tam jadom asim usa nu suna'i'e tam tusim usa sune ho'e da palana karom
Phira sade upara (zime) hai usa nu bi'ana karana
Kade vi nahim' sagom tusi' cahude ho jihari jaladi ave
Ate tusim chadade ho jihari dera nala ave
Usa dina kujha cehare khire honage
Apane raba vala vekha rahe honage
Ate usa dina kujha cihare udasa honage
Soca rahe honage ki unham de nala laka torana vala phaisala kita javega
Kade vi nahim jadom prana (gale di) saghi taka pahuca janage
Ate kiha javega ki jhara phuka karana vala kauna hai
Ate uha samajha lainage ki iha vicharana da samam hai
Ate pini (pijhani) te pini cara javegi
Uha dina tere raba vala jana va hovega
